info.author: Mike C. Fletcher
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Win32 AppBar control for wxPython

wxAppBar provides a wrapper for the Win32 AppBar control
for use with wxPython.  AppBars (also called Task Bars)
are given a reserved area on one side of the screen so
that they are always visible.

The wxAppBar control is built using ctypes (no C/C++
code), so can be readily customised.
info.name: wxAppBar
info.html_description:
Win32 AppBar control for wxPython

wxAppBar provides a wrapper for the Win32 AppBar control for use with wxPython. AppBars (also called Task Bars) are given a reserved area on one side of the screen so that they are always visible.

The wxAppBar control is built using ctypes (no C/C++ code), so can be readily customised.
